p: The designed diffuser has two parts, and was prepared to fit into the tunnel inlet with a surface covering the diameter of the fan to channel most of the impelled airflow. The diffuser was designed to direct the airflow, and was made up of 12 movable sheets of wood 0.5 cm thick with a height of 40 cm high and 4 cm separation between them. Figure 5b,c shows different views of the final aspect of the constructed diffuser and its location in the prototype.
